channel.title: [PI] Attacking delrith with silverlight

item.title: [PI] Attacking delrith with silverlight
item.dc:creator: @Atreyu1993 Atreyu1993
item.description:
@Atreyu1993 wrote:

Open your combatAssistant, find the applyNpcMeleeDamage void and add this statement inside of it.

if(Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 879 && c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] != 2402){ damage = 0; c.sendMessage("Your weapons have no affect on delrith!"); }

This is assuming that 879 is delrith, and 2402 is the silverlight id.

Also you will need to add to other methods in your combatAssistant so ranged/magic won’t work.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Attacking delrith with silverlight
item.dc:creator: @TheBigBob TheBigBob
item.description:
@TheBigBob wrote:

I’m trying to make it so that if a player does not have Silverlight(ID 2402) equipped, he will only hit 0’s
Though my code doesn’t work, I can still hit Delrith and it doesn’t even say the message?
This is my code, in Actionhandler, under FirstClickNpc:

case 879: if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] != 2402){ c.sendMessage("Delrith seems unaffected by your weapon."); c.setHitDiff(0); } break;

Read full topic
